00026 bp_api_struct* uvm_ml_barrier::_bp_provided_api = NULL;

00028 uvm_ml_barrier::uvm_ml_barrier(const string &name) : uvm_barrier(name), _pool(NULL) {
00029 }

00032   _pool = pool;

00045 void uvm_ml_barrier::wait_without_bp_notification() {
00046   uvm_barrier::wait();
00047 }
00048 
00049 void uvm_ml_barrier::wait() {
00050 //  notify_ml_barrier(UVM_ML_BARRIER_SET_THRESHOLD, get_num_barriers() + 1);
00051   wait_without_bp_notification();
00052 }
00053 
00054 void uvm_ml_barrier::raise_barrier_without_bp_notification(int count) {
00055   uvm_barrier::raise_barrier(count);
00056 }
00057 
00058 void uvm_ml_barrier::raise_barrier(int count) {
00059   notify_ml_barrier(UVM_ML_BARRIER_SET_THRESHOLD, get_num_barriers() + count);
00060   raise_barrier_without_bp_notification();
00061 }
00062 
00063 void uvm_ml_barrier::drop_barrier_without_bp_notification(int count) {
00064   uvm_barrier::drop_barrier(count);
00065 }
00066 
00067 void uvm_ml_barrier::drop_barrier(int count) {
00068   notify_ml_barrier(UVM_ML_BARRIER_SET_THRESHOLD, get_num_barriers() - count);
00069   drop_barrier_without_bp_notification();
00070 }
00071 
00072 void uvm_ml_barrier::notify_barrier_by_name(const char *                   scope_name,
00073                                             const char *                   barrier_name,
00074                                             uvm_ml_barrier_notify_action   action,
00075                                             int                            count,
00076                                             uvm_ml_time_unit               time_unit,
00077                                             double                         time_value){
00078 
00079   ENTER_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
00080 
00081   uvm_ml_barrier_pool * pool = dynamic_cast<uvm_ml_barrier_pool*>(uvm_ml_barrier_pool::get_pool(scope_name));
00082   assert(pool);
00083   uvm_ml_barrier * b = NULL;
00084   int on = 0;
00085   int nn = 0;
00086 
00087   if (pool->exists(barrier_name)) {
00088     if (action == UVM_ML_BARRIER_DELETE) {
00089       pool->remove_without_bp_notification(barrier_name); 
00090       EXIT_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
00091       return;
00092     }
00093   }
00094   
00095   b = dynamic_cast<uvm_ml_barrier*>(pool->get(barrier_name));
00096   assert(b);
00097 
00098   switch(action) {
00099     case UVM_ML_BARRIER_NEW : break;
00100     case UVM_ML_BARRIER_SET_AUTO_RESET: break;
00101     case UVM_ML_BARRIER_SET_THRESHOLD:
00102       on = b->get_num_barriers();
00103       nn = count;
00104       //assert(nn >= 0);
00105       if (nn > on)
00106          b->raise_barrier_without_bp_notification(nn - on);
00107       else {
00108          if (nn >= 0 && nn < on)
00109            b->drop_barrier_without_bp_notification(on - nn);
00110       }
00111       break;
00112     case UVM_ML_BARRIER_RESET :
00113       //b->drop_barrier_without_bp_notification(b->get_num_barriers());
00114       break;
00115     default : break;
00116   }
00117   EXIT_CO_SIMULATION_CONTEXT();
00118 }
00119 
00120 
00121 void uvm_ml_barrier::notify_ml_barrier(uvm_ml_barrier_notify_action     action,
00122                                        int count) {
00123   sc_core::sc_time current_time  = sc_core::sc_time_stamp(); 
00124   double           time_sec      = current_time.to_seconds();
00125   unsigned         framework_id  = uvm_ml_utils::FrameworkId();
00126 
00127   assert(_bp_provided_api);
00128   assert(_pool);
00129   (*_bp_provided_api->notify_barrier_ptr)(framework_id, _pool->get_full_name().c_str(), get_name().c_str(), action, count, (uvm_ml_time_unit) sc_core::SC_SEC, time_sec); 
00130 }

00133 // Note:  Initialize is only allowed to be run once
00134 void uvm_ml_barrier_pool::initialize()
00135 {
00136     if(uvm::uvm_factory::is_uvm_object_registered("uvm_ml_barrier_pool") == false)
00137     {
00138         // Factory override uvm_barrier_pool with uvm_ml_barrier_pool
00139         uvm::uvm_factory::register_uvm_object_creator("uvm_ml_barrier_pool",new uvm_ml_barrier_pool::uvm_object_creator_uvm_pool());
00140     }
00141 }
00142 
00143 uvm_barrier* uvm_ml_barrier_pool::get (const string& name) {
00144   uvm_ml_barrier* item;
00145   std::map< string, uvm_barrier* >::iterator it;
00146   it = _pool_map.find(name);
00147   if (it == _pool_map.end())
00148   {
00149     item = new uvm_ml_barrier(name);
00150     item->set_pool(this);
00151     _pool_map[name] = item;
00152   }
00153   return _pool_map[name];
00154 }
00155 
00156 bool uvm_ml_barrier_pool::remove (const string &name) {
00157   if (exists(name)) {
00158     uvm_ml_barrier* b = dynamic_cast<uvm_ml_barrier*>(get(name));
00159     assert(b);
00160     b->notify_ml_barrier(UVM_ML_BARRIER_DELETE);
00161   }
00162   return remove_without_bp_notification(name);
00163 }
00164 
00165 bool uvm_ml_barrier_pool::remove_without_bp_notification (const string &name) {
00166   std::map<string, uvm_barrier*>::iterator it;
00167   it = _pool_map.find(name);
00168   if (it == _pool_map.end())
00169   {
00170     return false;
00171   }
00172   else
00173   {
00174     _pool_map.erase(name);
00175     return true;
00176   }
00177 }
